The new-generation Mercedes-Benz GLS is 77mm longer and 22mm wider than its predecessor. The 2021 Kawasaki Ninja 1000SX also comes with updated ergonomics for both the rider and pillion. Both the rider and pillion seats are now thicker, offering more cushion and comfort. The new-generation Mercedes-Benz is expected to be offered with a pair of 3.0-litre diesel and petrol engine options. The six-cylinder diesel engine will produce 285bhp and a massive 600Nm of peak torque, while the 3.0-litre petrol unit churns out 366bhp and 500Nm of torque. Both engines will come mated to a nine-speed G-Tronic automatic gearbox with power sent to all four wheels. … [Read more...] about 2020 Mercedes Benz GLS Launching In India On June 17: Will Rival The BMW X7
